billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Provides that the N.Y. city health and hospital corporation spend a minimum of 10% of its budget on acute care and emergency room facilities in each borough
summary: Provides that the New York city health and hospital corporation spend a minimum of 10% of its budget on acute care and emergency room facilities in each borough and requires a representative from each borough.
lawSection: New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation Act
actClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city health and hospitals corporation act, in relation to the financing of acute care or emergency room facilities
